content:
Hi! (Hopefully I'm doing this right, never used zulip before).
Doing some embedded dev on an STM32F411, sadly though code navigation ("go to definition") in vscode using rust-analyzer doesn't work for me, completion also behaves rather strangely... is this a known problem? My setup looks like this:
.vscode/settings.json: {"rust-analyzer.cargo-watch.allTargets": false}
.cargo/config: https://dpaste.org/9oZW
cargo.toml: https://dpaste.org/ZNfR
main.rs: https://dpaste.org/NAiC
Ah, someone over at rust-embedded solved it: entry is a procedural macro. Hmmm...
